website_summaries.verdict: Impress your party guests by serving fun appetizers on these high quality ceramic spoons.
pros: Large set of Asian-style spoons comes with 12 pieces
The spoons sit flat with a raised handle, making them perfect for serving various appetizers in addition to soup
Ceramic spoons have a quality feel and weight to them
Spoons fit comfortably in your mouth and are dishwasher safe
cons: Bowl of spoon is a little on the shallow side

customer_reviews.title: perfect for appetizer/amuse bouche serving (what I wanted them for)
customer_reviews.text: These are small Asian soup spoons, perfect for appetizer/amuse bouche serving (what I wanted them for), but also good for the intended use (soup spoon). One of the 12 was broken in transit; I contacted the seller, who responded immediately and sent out a replacement (of the entire set of 12, not just the one spoon, likely negating all financial benefit of my purchase). Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: They're quite sturdy too. We have a very non forgiving kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are just as we expected! My seven-year-old daughter absolutely loves Asian food and she cannot get enough of using those spoons. She tries to use them for every meal. They're quite sturdy too. We have a very non forgiving kitchen floor and to our surprise when two of them dropped they did not break!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Torrice

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use for entertaining... used them for kids birthday parties with mini cup-cakes and just used them a few days ago for donut holes.... so many ways to use these for appetizers... really like them.
customer_reviews.author: christine artman

customer_reviews.title: More like appetizer spoons you see at fancy restaurants but still work for soup!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My package was late. So I was very disappointed in that. It was advertised as one day shipping but didn't recieved it for 2. In addition, my husband described them more as the spoons you see tiny appetizers served on at a fancy dinner opposed to spoons you see at Asian restaurants. We would have liked them to be a little deeper so we could fit more broth into them. However, overall it worked great in my Korean ramen, which is what we bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ju

customer_reviews.title: good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: These arrived perfect and unbroken. Nice quality too. We use them mostly for Asian soups, but also for serving sauces or dips.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price- “BUT” I did ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product , especially for the price- “BUT” I did not see the dimensions of the spoon part in detail. I thought all were the same dimension. This spoon part is smaller than my “norm” so it won’t fit the ravioli I intended for the appetizer presentation. I had to buy larger size at another distributor.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Delio

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons; great value.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these spoons to use as serving spoons for salad toppings (nuts, cranberries, cheese) and appetizers (salsa, dips, etc.). They work perfectly! The depth is just the right amount to be able to scoop items onto your plate. I’ve received lots of compliments on how cute they are for this purpose. These were a great price. I had very similar ones in the past from a chain store that cost $4 each! These were replacing ones that had broken. I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: They are small..delicate and well crafted.
customer_reviews.text: Love these spoons...they are small and perfect for my miso soup. Love using them with ice cream too. Actually bought them to do miniature painting on them, but drilling hole in the handles became problematic so I kept them as spoons..and happy to have them. They also make small little bowls to match.
customer_reviews.author: anotherperson

customer_reviews.title: Appetizers with style?
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to use these for serving appetizers. I went to a party and the caterers used them to serve a single serve shrimp cocktail and single serve civeche. I bought two sets for me and two sets for my son who always entertains.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Headley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, stand alone, and great for tastings and displays.
customer_reviews.text: These are actually quite sturdy and pretty. I love that they can stand on their own, making them useful for displays and fancy presentations. They are just the right size for tastings. I love that these don't have the little hole on top that many other brands do. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good company but I did not like these because......please read
customer_reviews.text: The flat bottom. It feels really weird when you try to eat with it. The same company StarPack have ones just like it (which I reviewed) but that are round on the bottem MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Soups on
customer_reviews.text: My family likes egg drop soup and chicken noodle soup. But complained the spoons did not hold enough. The spoons were easy to drop off a saucer. With my ceramic spoons these problems are gone. They hold a good mount of soup. They are also flat on the bottom so they sit nicely on a saucer.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: After years of using plastic versions of the asian soup spoons, I decided to treat myself to this ceramic set. Love them! I highly recommend them. They are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: BD FL

customer_reviews.title: Great soup spoons!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. They're a good price too. They arrived on time and in good shape. I didn't know if we really needed soup spoons, but they're much better for brothy soups than a regular spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Bexb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for soup noodles
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Exactly whats needed for asian soup noodles. also have used in the dishwasher with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the little ceramic spoons. I had seen these on oriental recipes and had to try some. They look so special with a spoon of food in them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent delivery time and beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are of good quality and the delivery was speedy. I'm into Asian dramas right now, so I wanted some of the spoons they use just for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very carefully packaged
customer_reviews.text: NICE. However, silly "review question." The spoons have no "flavor"! Why would that question be proposed?
customer_reviews.author: NonnaB

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as replacements for the ones that I've lost or broken over the years. Slightly smaller but plenty good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for ceramic spoons for serving and they are perfect. They are heavy enough and small enough to meet my needs for tasting and testing
customer_reviews.author: tonya hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Kids were happy to keep after the party!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a wedding reception buffet. Perfect for sauces and the white color makes this easy to use for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect spoon for soups.
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy spoons. I dropped one on cement from about 6 feet up on accident and it didn't even chip. It is the perfect spoon for soup.
customer_reviews.author: Mike37130

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Great for eating Pho broth; easy to clean and store as it is stackable.
customer_reviews.author: XcluYou

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The spoon quality is great. The delivery is fast. It arrived the next day I placed the order. Nothing was broken. I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: Great little spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to order these since several reviewers said they had some arrive broken. However, since they were for my son's science fair project and he only needed a few I decided to go for it. Happily, they all arrived safely and intact. They worked very well for the project and we will be able to use them for soup as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for plating!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for plating. I use this on some molecular gastronomy dishes and it really adds to the presentation. Great size for single bite tasting dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some amuse bouche spoons and these 100% fit the bill. Very professional looking and feeling. No broken spoons at all - good packing. Totally recommend if this is what you're looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sorbet or sample tastes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to serve premeal sorbet balls to my guests. They are perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality! I was really impressed. Love these and use them for sauces on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Householder

customer_reviews.title: Love these spoons
customer_reviews.text: This is a classic Asian soup spoon. Design is simple and easy to hold. Exactly what I was looking for

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted asian spoons since I moved from San Francisco and went driving around looking but was always told they were not in stock or they could order for me. I found these and the price is amazing. $14.99 for 12 spoons. They are a perfect weight and white goes with any table decor I decide to use.
customer_reviews.author: Evelynne E Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a pho bar I had on New Years. They worked out AMAZING. Very easy to clean as well!

customer_reviews.title: Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. They are a bit smaller than the same spoons in the restaurants we dine in though, but work just fine. My husband likes them.

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: The surface handle tip for this spoon is very rough and sharp.

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i have expected
customer_reviews.text: Spoons are exactly what i have expected and very good value. My husband dropped the package and broke a few (just be careful they are slippery if you aren't expect it),. Products are good, and delivery is fast. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: accountForreview

customer_reviews.title: Cute spoons in our egg drop soup
customer_reviews.text: Wanted Asian soup spoons for our appetizer egg drop soup in small bowls. The spoons fit right into place and everyone loved them!

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are of good quality. They arrived quickly and were exactly what I needed. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Great for soups.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Like that it’s not plastic. Great for soups and stews. Cools the soup off fast for the right temperature.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and costumer service . Will buy again .

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: They are too small. Not suitable for adult. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little shallow
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a bit Shallow for a spoon but it works and for the price and amount of spoons I got it was worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size which is fine, but I don't think the can even handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller size which is fine, but I don't think the can even handle top rack dish washer. Starting to warm after couple washes.
customer_reviews.author: Nye Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the spoons. De are not experts but de liked the quality. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gua Sha!
customer_reviews.text: Great for Gua Sha which is what I purchased them for!

customer_reviews.title: The quality and style was even better then I expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality and style was even better then I expected! I will definitely be buying other products from this company and recommend them to my friends 💛💜💛💙

customer_reviews.title: Asian design but good for international foods
customer_reviews.text: Nice for soups and fluid casseroles. Rated four stars on durability because ceramic is more fragile than plastic.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in good condition packaged well and are exactly as described

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: loved soup spoons, exactly what I needed. very good material and nicely made. great customer service. I highly recommend it everyone.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at an awesome price! We bought a bunch for a dinner party and the guests loved the presentation.

customer_reviews.title: Great for soup and cereal!
customer_reviews.text: If you like milk with your cereal this is the spoon to use.

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic spoons, yes they work.
customer_reviews.text: They do as advertised and clean up well. They are what they are.

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect spoons -- nice and flat on the bottom. No rough edges. Love them!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: The edges do not have the polished ceramic feel. They are very rough.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: More comfortable to use and the food tastes better than when using metal spoons.

customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the spoons. Great price for the product

customer_reviews.text: Great and fun for small, individual appetizers. Packaging was excellent.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons
customer_reviews.text: Great spoons and they make my appetizer bites that much better

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a very reasonable price. Less expensive than those in sold in Chinese stores

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ceramic spoons at a very reasonable price I would order again from this company
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE DUNLAVEY

customer_reviews.title: Great quality of spoon
customer_reviews.text: Great quality of spoon, though smaller than I anticipated. Some of the pictures make them look like the scoop is wider and deeper than it really is. They would be cute for a appetizer decoration like in the pictures, but I really wouldn't recommend this for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small-not for soup!
customer_reviews.text: I would not call these soup spoons, these are for passed appetizers only.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Coff

customer_reviews.title: Superior
customer_reviews.text: I don't care what anyone says, these type of spoons are superior for soup! The spoons arrived wrapped in bubble wrap and nestled in a little box. None of mine were broken, but the box they came in was tucked inside a larger order. I'm really pleased with these spoons. They're ceramic so they feel a lot nicer to hold than the plastic version. They're also a little bit classier than the ones found at buffets. Perfect size too.
customer_reviews.author: Space Cadet

customer_reviews.title: Asian style soup spoons.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons have very short handles, your hand practically touches your lips. The body is thick, they cannot be used well to cut veggies or meat in the bowl. They are ceramic and will shatter or chip if dropped. The edges will scour and scratch if scrubbed too hard leaving permanent scratches on the surface. I would consider these to be nearly disposable. I would also suggest not letting small kids use them since they are fragile and breakable. But with very short handles they are designed for use by people with small hands. On the plus side, being ceramic the edges are very smooth and feel comfortable as you use them to eat soups.
customer_reviews.author: G. Matot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little soup spoon for your soup.
customer_reviews.text: They are just as described and perfect for serving my oriental soup dishes. They are solid white so they pair well with the small white bowls I already had. Not cheap plastic like you get for the price anywhere else but a pretty ceramic that looks good and should last a long time time with proper use and care. I may even get another set later.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for broths, thick soups, or tiny appetizers. They also make an amazing hors d'oeuvres display, lending a flawless background to tiny bits of artistic foods. I bought these to use at a dinner party because my silver plate didn't have enough soup spoons and everyone loved them. After, I just rinsed them off and put them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Soup spoons
customer_reviews.text: I always liked the spoons for soup in my favorite Chinese restaurant. I always thought they had to be purchased in a restaurant supply house. When I saw I could buy a small amount and they were still a ceramic spoon (not plastic), I was a happy person! Love them, and my soup even tastes better!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We use it for all sorts of dishes. Kids have dropped in the stainless steel sink and they haven't broken, unlike others we've had.
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These came so quickly, I was quite frankly surprised. These are made with very nice ceramic and are nicely weighted. They are a tad bit small, but I really like them and cannot wait to use them often.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: We’ve already had 2 break, kind of disappointed. But they are a great shape to eat soup
customer_reviews.author: Sarah @blessedcrazytxnest

customer_reviews.title: Very short handle.
customer_reviews.text: Warning the handles are very short. They are ok for soup spoon when I want to heat my canned soup in the microwave oven because who wants to have to take out the spoon and put it on a napkin.

customer_reviews.title: Great dpoons

product_meta.title: StarPack Premium 12 Piece Ceramic Asian Soup Spoon/Appetizer Spoon Set
feature_bullets: CREATE EASY PINTEREST-WORTHY APPETIZERS – These elegant Asian-style soup spoons are perfect for beautiful one-bite appetizers, just place tiny portions on each spoon and serve on a platter or board
MAKE YOUR NEXT EVENT EXTRA SPECIAL – Whether it’s your DIY-Wedding, holiday gathering, or backyard cookout, these appetizer spoons will surprise and delight your guests

ENTERTAINING MADE SIMPLE – Not just for elegant soups and appetizers, try placing mini desserts on these spoons for a gorgeous sweet buffet. You’ll also receive a FREE ‘101 Cooking Tips’ PDF valued at $5.95 to get you started!
ESSENTIAL SET FOR ENTERTAINERS – Set contains: 12 x White Ceramic Spoons (Each measures: 5”x1.5”)

QUALITY YOU CAN COUNT ON, AND FULL STARPACK WARRANTY – Like all StarPack products, these ceramic spoons are made with durable, quality materials. We offer a full refund or replacement if you are not 100% satisfied with your purchase

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars338 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
